description: This table contains information about hospital accounts that are associated with a given statement.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement print or detail bill record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID.

columns.name: HB_PREV_PAT_BAL
columns.description: The hospital account previous patient balance.

columns.name: HB_NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The hospital account new charge amount.

columns.name: HB_NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The hospital account new payment amount.

columns.name: HB_NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The hospital account new adjustment amount.

columns.name: HB_TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The hospital account total charge amount.

columns.name: HB_TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The hospital account total payment amount.

columns.name: HB_TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The hospital account total adjustment amount.

columns.name: HB_CURR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: Stores the Hospital Billing outstanding self-pay balance for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CURR_AMT_DUE
columns.description: Stores the Hospital Billing amount due for the hospital account. It is usually the self-pay outstanding balance, but will be zero for accounts on a payment plan (since the payment plan amount due is really at the guarantor level unless sending hospital account level statements).

columns.name: HB_PAT_LIAB_SPLIT_UP
columns.description: The hospital account patient liability split-up.

columns.name: HB_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: The hospital account admit date.

columns.name: HB_DISCHARGE_DATE
columns.description: The hospital account discharge date.

columns.name: HB_PRIM_DX_ID
columns.description: The hospital account primary diagnosis.

columns.name: HB_SP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hospital account self-pay status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Full Self-Pay Due


Review


Payment Plan


Pre-collection


Bad Debt


Prorated

columns.name: HB_FIRST_STMT_DATE
columns.description: The hospital account first statement date.

columns.name: HB_PREV_STMT_DATE
columns.description: The hospital account previous statement date.

columns.name: HB_SENT_STMT_CNT
columns.description: The number of statements sent for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_IS_INFORMATIONAL_YN
columns.description:
The hospital account-level storage of whether this particular hospital account had a patient balance.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HB_PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: The hospital account-level previous insurance balance.

columns.name: HB_NEW_INS_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The new insurance charges at the hospital account level.

columns.name: HB_NEW_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The new insurance payments for this hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The new insurance adjustments on this hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CURR_INS_BAL
columns.description: The current insurance balance on this hospital account.

columns.name: PB_PREV_PAT_BAL
columns.description: Previous professional patient balance on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: New professional charges on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: New professional payments on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: New professional adjustments on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Total professional charges on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Total professional payments on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Total professional adjustments on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_CURR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: Stores the Professional Billing outstanding self-pay balance for the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_CURR_AMT_DUE
columns.description: Stores the Professional Billing amount due for the hospital account. It is usually the self-pay outstanding balance, but will be zero for accounts on a payment plan (since the payment plan amount due is really at the guarantor level unless sending hospital account level statements).

columns.name: PB_PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: Previous professional insurance balance on the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_NEW_INS_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The new professional charges for which an insurance payment is expected.

columns.name: PB_NEW_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The new professional payments that have been applied to the insurance portion of charges and debit adjustments.

columns.name: PB_NEW_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The amount of new adjustment applied to the insurance portion of the hospital account.

columns.name: PB_CURR_INS_BAL
columns.description: The current professional insurance balance.

columns.name: PB_TOT_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Professional Billing patient payments for a hospital account.

columns.name: PB_TOT_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Professional Billing patient adjustments for a hospital account.

columns.name: PB_TOT_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Professional Billing insurance payments for a hospital account.

columns.name: PB_TOT_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Professional Billing insurance adjustments for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_PAT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Stores the new patient charges for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the new patient payments for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the new patient adjustments for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_PMT_PLAN_INIT_BAL
columns.description: Stores the Hospital Billing hospital account-level initial payment plan balance.

columns.name: HB_PMT_PLAN_REMAIN_BAL
columns.description: Stores the Hospital Billing hospital account-level remaining payment plan balance.

columns.name: HB_COLLECTION_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the hospital account's collection status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active AR


External Agency AR


Bad Debt


Outsourced

columns.name: HB_COLL_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: Stores the outsource agency for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_COLL_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: HB_IS_OUTSOURCED_YN
columns.description:
Stores if the hospital account has been outsourced.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HB_IS_INFORMATIONAL_YN

columns.name: HB_FOLLOW_UP_CYCLE_LEVEL
columns.description: Follow-up cycle level for this hospital account.

columns.name: HB_SP_FOLLOW_UP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the hospital account self-pay follow-up level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Level 1


Level 2


Level 3


Level 4


Level 5


Level 6


Level 7


Level 8


Level 9


Level 10

columns.name: HB_PMT_PLAN_DUE
columns.description: Stores the Hospital Billing hospital account-level payment plan due.

columns.name: HB_PMT_PLAN_MONTHLY_AMT
columns.description: Stores the Hospital Billing hospital account-level payment plan monthly amount.

columns.name: HB_STATEMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Hospital Billing hospital account statement type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Full Self-pay


Prorated / Estimated Payment Plan


Informational

columns.name: HB_SP_AGING_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date for aging the self-pay balances.

columns.name: HB_PREV_STMT_END_BATCH_DATE
columns.description: Stores the end system batch date of the last statement generated for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_PREV_STMT_PRINT_ID
columns.description: Stores the previous statement generated for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_TOT_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Hospital Billing patient payments for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_TOT_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Hospital Billing patient adjustments for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_TOT_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Hospital Billing insurance payments for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_TOT_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total Hospital Billing insurance adjustments for a hospital account.

columns.name: HB_PMT_PLAN_OVERDUE_AMT
columns.description: Stores the hospital account-level payment plan overdue amount.

columns.name: HB_PMT_PLAN_PAID_AHEAD_AMT
columns.description: Stores the hospital account-level payment plan paid ahead amount.

columns.name: HB_ADVBILL_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: Stores the advance bill estimate on the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_CONTESTED_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Sum of new contested Hospital Billing charges for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_CONTESTED_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Sum of new contested Hospital Billing payments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_CONTESTED_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Sum of new contested Hospital Billing adjustments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_CONTESTED_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Sum of new contested Hospital Billing insurance payments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_NEW_CONTESTED_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Sum of new contested Hospital Billing insurance adjustments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CONTESTED_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Sum of all contested Hospital Billing charges for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CONTESTED_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Sum of all contested Hospital Billing payments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CONTESTED_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Sum of all contested Hospital Billing adjustments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CONTESTED_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Sum of all contested Hospital Billing insurance payments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CONTESTED_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Sum of all contested Hospital Billing insurance adjustments for the hospital account.

columns.name: HB_CONTESTED_BAL
columns.description: Total contested balance for the hospital account.
